UnsuspendBrokerCommissionAction, ValidateEmailChangeAction, ViewDocumentAction, ViewDynamicDocumentAction, ViewErrorLogEntryAction, ViewMessageAction

    public abstract class BaseAction
extends org.apache.struts.action.Action
    Abstract action intented to be subclasses by all actions that need a logged user (not LoginAction, for example). The standard execute method is implemented and marked as final. Another method, executeAction, is exposed for subclasses to implement it in order to perform the specific action
    Author:
    luis

      • resolveLoginForward

        protected org.apache.struts.action.ActionForward resolveLoginForward(org.apache.struts.action.ActionMapping actionMapping,
                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Returns a forward to the login page. Will be invoked when the member was disconnected.

      • storePath

        protected boolean storePath(org.apache.struts.action.ActionMapping actionMapping,
                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Should be overriden by subclasses to return false on actions that are not stored on navigation path. By default, returns true when the current request is a GET and the action has an input page.
